subject: Baseball
Bonuses
Athletics and Sports
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez won the American League Most Valuable Player award, and in so doing gained a $1.5 million bonus under the contract he opted out of three weeks ago.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez won the American League Most Valuable Player award, and in so doing gained a $1.5 million bonus under the contract he opted out of three weeks ago.
